data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Cacheu, Guinea-Bissau to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cacheu, Guinea-Bissau
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cacheu. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: There are 179,700 people living in the state of Cacheu. Only about 3,737 might be believers.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 3,737 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bambara people might believe through him.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Cacheu.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Cacheu that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Cacheu prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

location.name: Cacheu
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Biafada, Mankanya, Nalu, Balanta, Nyakra
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Syrian (1,500), Biafada (57,000), Mankanya (56,000), Nalu (11,000), Balanta, Nyakra (15,000)
